title: praiscamp 2024 – capturing the heart of the event
shortDescription: capturing the unforgettable moments of praiscamp 2024/25, i told a visual story of inspiration, community, and joy.
longDescription:
at praiscamp 2024/25, i had the privilege of working as a photographer, contributing to an extraordinary project that connects, inspires, and uplifts people. praiscamp, a large christian youth camp, is renowned for its powerful atmosphere, inspiring sessions, and strong sense of community.

my role was to capture the unforgettable moments – from heartfelt worship sessions and engaging workshops to the personal connections that make the camp so unique. with my camera, i aimed to authentically portray the energy, joy, and emotions of the event, creating a visual story that continues to resonate long after.

this project was a special challenge and a meaningful milestone in my photography journey. collaborating with a dedicated team and combining my passion for photography with an inspiring message made praiscamp 2024/25 an unforgettable experience for me.

title: s&d design – a shooting with new experience in interior design
shortDescription: photographing a stylish living room for s&d design challenged me to capture the elegance and atmosphere of interior design for the first time.
longDescription:
i had the opportunity to work with s&d design (spetzler und strub design) on a special project, capturing photos of a beautifully designed living room. this was an entirely new experience for me, as i had never photographed interior design before.

my goal was to highlight the room’s unique atmosphere, the thoughtful details, and the harmonious combination of colors, textures, and lighting. this project challenged me to approach photography from a new perspective, focusing on composition and mood to bring the space to life through my lens.

working with s&d design was both inspiring and rewarding, pushing me to grow creatively while delivering images that reflect the elegance of their work.

title: engagement at sedel, herisau – capturing pure love in nature's beauty
shortDescription: capturing the beautiful engagement moment at sedel, herisau, with a stunning view and heartfelt emotions.
longDescription:
i had the honor of photographing a beautiful engagement at sedel, herisau, surrounded by breathtaking views and genuine emotions. the location, perched high above the town, provided the perfect backdrop for this special moment. my goal was to capture the love, joy, and excitement between the couple in the most authentic way, preserving the essence of their engagement.

this photoshoot was a wonderful experience, as it allowed me to work in a stunning natural environment while telling a love story through my lens. the connection between the couple and the scenic surroundings made it an unforgettable moment in my photography journey.

title: musical 25 – emotions, energy, and lights on stage
shortDescription: capturing the energy and emotion of musical25 was an unforgettable journey through light, color, and passion.
longDescription:
musical25 was more than just a performance – it was a vibrant celebration of passion, creativity, and talent. as the event photographer, i had the privilege of capturing the intensity of every scene, the spark in the performers’ eyes, and the shared joy between audience and cast.

from dramatic spotlights to quiet backstage moments, i documented the heart and soul of the production. the challenge was to freeze motion and emotion in perfect balance, using light and perspective to underline the powerful storytelling on stage.

being part of such a dedicated and inspiring team was an incredible experience. this project reminded me once again why i love photography – it’s about preserving the feeling of a moment, long after the curtain falls.

title: s&d design – light. lines. life.
shortDescription: photographing a bedroom and dining room for s&d design, I explored how light and materials shape the ambiance and tell a unique story.
longDescription:
this was my second time working with s&d design in st. gallen, and it felt like a reunion. the focus was on the bedroom and dining room – spaces that are full of subtle stories waiting to be discovered. through my lens, I aimed to capture the harmony between light, shadow, textures, and the carefully chosen materials that make each room feel alive.

every room speaks its own language, and it was my challenge to translate that into images. my goal was to highlight the play of light and the calming atmosphere that these spaces radiate. it's always an enriching experience to collaborate with a design team that values both creativity and attention to detail.

I’m grateful to s&d design for the opportunity and the trust to capture their vision. as always, the final results speak for themselves, reflecting the beauty of the spaces they create.

title: icf youth – capturing energy, faith and community
shortDescription: on may 17th, I had the chance to document the dynamic atmosphere of an icf youth event – full of energy, connection and emotion.
longDescription:
on may 17th, I had the opportunity to photograph an icf youth event – a powerful gathering full of young people, music, energy, and meaningful moments. my goal was to visually capture the vibe of the evening: the excitement, the joy, the moments of reflection, and everything in between.

it’s always special to be part of events like these, where community and faith come together in such an authentic and lively way. as a photographer, i tried to stay in the background while catching the real emotions and interactions that made this evening so unique.

big thanks to the icf youth team for trusting me with this project – it was a truly inspiring experience and one i’m proud to have documented.
